author: The Linux Foundation
description:
Centralized platforms have shaped our online experiences—but change is here. The Linux Foundation Research report, Decentralization and AI, explores how AI and decentralized systems can create a more resilient, open, and user-centered Internet.

📘 Learn how you can be part of this change: https://www.linuxfoundation.org/research/decentralized-internet?hsLang=en

#AI #Decentralization #LinuxFoundation
title: 🌐 A More Open Digital World Awaits
